about_the_game:
Ever wondered what the cast of Orgynizer would look like if they forgot their clothes? Well, wonder no more! Introducing the "Bare Essentials" DLC - the ultimate in pixelated modesty (or the lack thereof).

With this excellent DLC, your tiny characters now strip down to their birthday suits when you successfully satisfy them. But miss their criteria, and the clothes remain firmly in place.

Key Features

Pixel-Perfect Nudity: Experience Orgynizer's beloved characters like never before. We've stripped down the pixels to bring you the most minimalist wardrobe imaginable.
A Laugh in Every Pixel: Designed as a lighthearted joke, this DLC adds a whole new layer of comedy to the game. It's all in good fun and meant to bring a smile to your face.
Supporting a Good Cause: Just like with the base game, all proceeds from this DLC will go directly to charity. Laugh and feel good knowing you're supporting a great cause.

Please Note

It's All About the Joke: Remember, this is a highly pixelated game. The "nudity" is extremely low-res and meant for laughs, not titillation.
Mature Content Description: This DLC contains content not appropriate for all ages: pixelated nudity intended for humorous purposes.
Join the Fun and Support a Good Cause!
By purchasing the "Bare Essentials" DLC, you're not just getting a chuckle; you're helping us support Planned Parenthood (or a charity of your choice), the same charity that benefited from the base game. Let's make a difference, one nude pixel at a time.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Orgynizer - Bare Essentials DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3.0 GHz and higher
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Get the full naughty Orgynizer experience with some steamy low-resolution naked skin. The Bare Essentials DLC makes the character take off their clothes when they are successfully satisfied during your orgies. Nothing more, nothing less.
